content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Enhanced third-party ticketing and notification options in Case Management December 6, 2024—Case Management now offers granular control over third-party ticketing system integration and notification settings at the individual case level. You can configure case-specific ServiceNow ticket destinations and customize notification channels through webhooks and email, enabling bi-directional synchronization between Trend Vision One cases and external ticketing systems. Workflow and Automation → Case Management © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Enhanced third-party ticketing and notification options in Case Management
